Description: The maximum difference in temperature (in C) between adjacent zones on the thermocycler block
The maximum acceptable difference in temperature (in C) between the optimal annealing temperature of a PCR reaction, and the annealing temperature of the thermocycler block zone it is sitting in
The maximum number of Monte-Carlo steps attempted per thermocycler block zone
The maximum liquid volume (in uL) that a well in the multi-well plate can hold
The final temperature at the end of the Monte-Carlo simulated annealing run (in arbitrary reduced units)
The initial temperature in the beginning of the Monte-Carlo simulated annealing run (in arbitrary reduced units)
The minimum pipetting volume (e.g. for a robotics platform) (in uL)
The number of columns in the multi-well plate
The number of rows in the multi-well plate
The Monte-Carlo step trial change in temperature for a thermocycler block zone
The number of wells per thermocycler block zone
The number of zones per thermocycler block
